parameters.name: ApiName
parameters.description: The operation that you want to perform.

parameters.name: ApiVersion
parameters.description:
The version number of the API.

>  You can call the [DescribeGroupProductions](~~DescribeGroupProductions~~) operation to query the version number.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese.
*   **en**: English.

parameters.name: PopCode
parameters.description: The POP code of the Alibaba Cloud service.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the user who switches from the current view to the destination view by using the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Default value: 0. Valid values:

*   0: the view of the current Alibaba Cloud account.
*   1: the view of all accounts for the enterprise.
